languages.text: Попав в ловушку или получив в течение одного {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунда{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урон{/g} больше 50% от общего запаса {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g}, персонаж приобретает свежее ранение (процент зависит от выбранного уровня сложности игры). Ранения снижают {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}решимость{/g} персонажей. Если свежее ранение не исцелить с помощью {g|ib:Medikit}медкомплекта{/g} в течение трех раундов, оно превратится в старое ранение. Избавиться от старого ранения также можно с помощью медкомплекта, однако лечение потребует дополнительной {g|Encyclopedia:Test}проверки{/g} навыка {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Медицина{/g}. Все ранения уменьшают показатели персонажа, а если их накопится больше трех — превращаются в травмы (число ранений, вызывающих {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}травму{/g}, может меняться в зависимости от выбранной вами сложности игры).
languages.original_text: After falling into a trap or receiving damage that exceeds 50% of their total {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wounds{/g} within one round, the character receives a Fresh Injury. If the Fresh Injury is not healed within five rounds with the use of {g|ib:Medikit}Medikit{/g}, it will turn into an Old Injury. You can also get rid of the Old Injury with a Medikit, however, healing will require an additional {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g} skill test. All Injuries reduce the character's stats, and if three or more Injuries accumulate, they turn into {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}Traumas{/g} (the number of Injuries that cause Trauma may vary depending on the difficulty of the game you choose).

traits.locale_text:
Попав в ловушку или получив в течение одного раунда урон больше 50% {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g}, персонаж приобретает свежее ранение. Если свежее ранение не исцелить с помощью {g|ib:Medikit}медкомплекта{/g} в течение пяти раундов, оно превратится в старое ранение. Избавиться от старого ранения также можно с помощью медкомплекта, однако лечение потребует дополнительной проверки навыка {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Медицина{/g}.
Все ранения уменьшают показатели персонажа, а если их накопится больше трех — превращаются в {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}травмы{/g} (число ранений, вызывающих травму, может меняться в зависимости от выбранной вами сложности игры).

Попав в ловушку или получив в течение одного раунда урон больше 50% {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g}, персонаж приобретает свежее ранение. Если свежее ранение не исцелить с помощью {g|ib:Medikit}медкомплекта{/g} в течение пяти раундов, оно превратится в старое ранение. Избавиться от старого ранения также можно с помощью медкомплекта, однако лечение потребует дополнительной проверки навыка {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Медицина{/g}.
Все ранения уменьшают показатели персонажа, а если их накопится больше трех — превращаются в {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}травмы{/g} (число ранений, вызывающих травму, может меняться в зависимости от выбранной вами сложности игры).

languages.text: After falling into a trap or receiving {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} that exceeds 50% of their total {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} within one {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, a character will receive a fresh injury (the exact percentage of wounds a character must lose for this to happen may vary depending on the difficulty of the game you choose). Injuries reduce a character's {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g}. If the fresh injury is not healed within three rounds using a {g|ib:Medikit}medikit{/g}, it will {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} into an old injury. You can also get rid of the old injury with a medikit; however, healing will require an additional {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g} skill {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}. All injuries reduce a character's stats, and if three or more injuries accumulate, they turn into {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}traumas{/g} (the number of injuries that cause trauma may vary depending on the difficulty of the game you choose).
languages.original_text: Попав в ловушку или получив в течение одного раунда урон больше 50% от общего запаса {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровья{/g}, персонаж приобретает свежее ранение (процент зависит от выбранного уровня сложности игры). Ранения снижают {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}решимость{/g} персонажей. Если свежее ранение не исцелить с помощью {g|ib:Medikit}медкомплекта{/g} в течение трех раундов, оно превратится в старое ранение. Избавиться от старого ранения также можно с помощью медкомплекта, однако лечение потребует дополнительной проверки навыка {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Медицина{/g}. Все ранения уменьшают показатели персонажа, а если их накопится больше трех — превращаются в {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}травмы{/g} (число ранений, вызывающих травму, может меняться в зависимости от выбранной вами сложности игры).

traits.locale_text: After falling into a trap or receiving damage that exceeds 50% of their total {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} within one round, a character will receive a fresh injury. If the fresh injury is not healed within five rounds using a {g|ib:Medikit}medikit{/g}, it will turn into an old injury. You can also get rid of the old injury with a medikit; however, healing will require an additional {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g} skill test. All injuries reduce a character's stats, and if three or more injuries accumulate, they turn into {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}traumas{/g} (the number of injuries that cause trauma may vary depending on the difficulty of the game you choose).

After falling into a trap or receiving {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} that exceeds 50% of their total {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} within one {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, a character will receive a fresh injury (the exact percentage of wounds a character must lose for this to happen may vary depending on the difficulty of the game you choose). Injuries reduce a character's {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g}. If the fresh injury is not healed within three rounds using a {g|ib:Medikit}medikit{/g}, it will {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} into an old injury. You can also get rid of the old injury with a medikit; however, healing will require an additional {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g} skill {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}. All injuries reduce a character's stats, and if three or more injuries accumulate, they turn into {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}traumas{/g} (the number of injuries that cause trauma may vary depending on the difficulty of the game you choose).

After falling into a trap or receiving {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} that exceeds 50% of their total {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} within one {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, a character will receive a fresh injury (the exact percentage of wounds a character must lose for this to happen may vary depending on the difficulty of the game you choose). Injuries reduce a character's {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g}. If the fresh injury is not healed within three rounds using a {g|ib:Medikit}medikit{/g}, it will {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} into an old injury. You can also get rid of the old injury with a medikit; however, healing will require an additional {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g} skill {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}. All injuries reduce a character's stats, and if three or more injuries accumulate, they turn into {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}traumas{/g} (the number of injuries that cause trauma may vary depending on the difficulty of the game you choose).

languages.text: Nachdem er in eine Falle getappt ist oder in einer {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} mehr als 50 % seiner {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} als {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} erlitten hat, erhält ein Charakter eine frische Verletzung (der genaue Prozentsatz von Wunden, den ein Charakter verlieren muss, damit dies geschieht, kann von der ausgewählten Spielschwierigkeit abhängen). Verletzungen reduzieren die {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}Entschlossenheit{/g} eines Charakters. Wenn die frische Verletzung nicht innerhalb von drei Runden durch Einsatz eines {g|ib:Medikit}Medikits{/g} geheilt wurde, {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}verwandelt{/g} sie sich in eine alte Verletzung. Mit Hilfe eines Medikits kann man auch eine alte Verletzung entfernen. Hierzu ist dann aber eine zusätzliche {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g}-Fertigkeit-{g|Encyclopedia:Test}Probe{/g} erforderlich. Alle Verletzungen reduzieren die Werte eines Charakters. Sammeln sich drei oder mehr Verletzungen an, werden sie zu {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}Traumata{/g} (die Anzahl der Traumata auslösenden Verletzungen kann von der ausgewählten Spielschwierigkeit abhängen).
languages.original_text: After falling into a trap or receiving {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} that exceeds 50% of their total {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} within one {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, a character will receive a fresh injury (the exact percentage of wounds a character must lose for this to happen may vary depending on the difficulty of the game you choose). Injuries reduce a character's {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g}. If the fresh injury is not healed within three rounds using a {g|ib:Medikit}medikit{/g}, it will {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} into an old injury. You can also get rid of the old injury with a medikit; however, healing will require an additional {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g} skill {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}. All injuries reduce a character's stats, and if three or more injuries accumulate, they turn into {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}traumas{/g} (the number of injuries that cause trauma may vary depending on the difficulty of the game you choose).

traits.locale_text: Nachdem er in eine Falle getappt ist oder für mehr als 50 % seiner gesamten {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} innerhalb einer {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} beschädigt wurde, erhält ein Charakter eine {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}frische Verletzung{/g} (der genaue Prozentsatz von Wunden, den ein Charakter verlieren muss, damit dies geschieht, kann von der ausgewählten Spielschwierigkeit abhängen). Verletzungen reduzieren die {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}Entschlossenheit{/g} eines Charakters. Wenn die frische Verletzung nicht innerhalb von drei Runden durch Einsatz eines {g|ib:Medikit}Medikits{/g} geheilt wurde, {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}verwandelt{/g} sie sich in eine alte Verletzung. Mit Hilfe eines Medikits kann man auch eine alte Verletzung entfernen. Hierzu ist dann aber eine zusätzliche {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g}- {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Fertigkeit{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Test}Probe{/g} erforderlich. Alle Verletzungen reduzieren die Werte eines Charakters, und falls sich drei oder mehr Verletzungen ansammeln, werden sie zu {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}Traumata{/g} (die Anzahl der Traumata auslösenden Verletzungen kann von der ausgewählten Spielschwierigkeit abhängen).

languages.text: Après être tombé dans un piège ou avoir subi des {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} supérieurs à 50 % de sa réserve totale de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} au cours d'un même {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, un personnage reçoit une lésion récente (le pourcentage exact de blessures qu'un personnage doit perdre pour que cela se produise peut varier en fonction du niveau de difficulté choisi). Les blessures réduisent la {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}détermination{/g} du personnage. Si une lésion récente n'est pas soignée à l'aide d'un {g|ib:Medikit}médikit{/g} au cours des trois rounds qui suivent, elle se {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}transforme{/g} en lésion ancienne. Vous pouvez également vous débarrasser d'une lésion ancienne à l'aide d'un médikit, mais un {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} de compétence de {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g} supplémentaire est alors nécessaire. Toutes les lésions réduisent les statistiques du personnage, et tout cumul d'au moins trois lésions se transforme en {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}traumatisme{/g} (le nombre de lésions provoquant un traumatisme peut varier en fonction du niveau de difficulté choisi).
languages.original_text: After falling into a trap or receiving {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} that exceeds 50% of their total {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} within one {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, a character will receive a fresh injury (the exact percentage of wounds a character must lose for this to happen may vary depending on the difficulty of the game you choose). Injuries reduce a character's {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g}. If the fresh injury is not healed within three rounds using a {g|ib:Medikit}medikit{/g}, it will {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} into an old injury. You can also get rid of the old injury with a medikit; however, healing will require an additional {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g} skill {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}. All injuries reduce a character's stats, and if three or more injuries accumulate, they turn into {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}traumas{/g} (the number of injuries that cause trauma may vary depending on the difficulty of the game you choose).

traits.locale_text: Après être tombé dans un piège ou avoir subi des dégâts supérieurs à 50 % de sa réserve totale de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} au cours d'un même {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, un personnage reçoit une {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}blessure récente{/g} (le pourcentage exact de blessures qu'un personnage doit perdre pour que cela se produise peut varier en fonction du niveau de difficulté que vous choisissez dans le jeu). Les blessures réduisent la {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}détermination{/g} du personnage. Si une blessure récente n'est pas soignée à l'aide d'un {g|ib:Medikit}médikit{/g} au cours des trois rounds qui suivent, elle se {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}transforme{/g} en blessure ancienne. Vous pouvez également vous débarrasser d'une blessure ancienne à l'aide d'un médikit mais un {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}compétence{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g} supplémentaire est alors nécessaire. Toutes les blessures réduisent les statistiques du personnage, et tout cumul d'au moins trois blessures se transforme en {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}traumatisme{/g} (le nombre de blessures qui provoquent un traumatisme peut varier en fonction du niveau de difficulté que vous choisissez dans le jeu).

languages.text: 如果角色触发陷阱，或在一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}中承受的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}总量超过最大{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}的50%，角色将会获得一处新伤。触发伤势效果需要的生命值百分比，可能会根据您的游戏难度不同而发生变化。伤势会降低角色的{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}决心{/g}。如果新伤未能在三轮内使用{g|ib:Medikit}医疗包{/g}及时治疗，则会变成旧伤。尽管您也可以使用医疗包来治疗旧伤，但必须额外通过{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}医疗{/g}技能{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}，才能成功移除旧伤。 所有伤势都会降低角色属性，如果某个角色承受了3处或更多伤势，这些伤势就会变为{g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}创伤{/g}。触发创伤效果需要的伤势数量，可能会根据您的游戏难度不同而发生变化。
languages.original_text: After falling into a trap or receiving {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} that exceeds 50% of their total {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} within one {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, a character will receive a fresh injury (the exact percentage of wounds a character must lose for this to happen may vary depending on the difficulty of the game you choose). Injuries reduce a character's {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g}. If the fresh injury is not healed within three rounds using a {g|ib:Medikit}medikit{/g}, it will {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} into an old injury. You can also get rid of the old injury with a medikit; however, healing will require an additional {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g} skill {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}. All injuries reduce a character's stats, and if three or more injuries accumulate, they turn into {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}traumas{/g} (the number of injuries that cause trauma may vary depending on the difficulty of the game you choose).

traits.locale_text: 如果角色触发陷阱，或在一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}中承受的伤害总量超过最大{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}的50%，角色将会获得一处{g|Encyclopedia:Injury}新伤{/g}。触发伤势效果需要的生命值百分比，可能会根据您的游戏难度不同而发生变化。伤势会降低角色的{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}决心{/g}。如果新伤未能在三轮内使用{g|ib:Medikit}医疗包{/g}及时治疗，则会变成旧伤。{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}{/g}尽管您也可以使用医疗包来治疗旧伤，但必须额外通过{g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}医疗{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Skills}技能{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}，才能成功移除旧伤。 所有伤势都会降低角色属性，如果某个角色承受了3处或更多伤势，这些伤势就会变为{g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}创伤{/g}。触发创伤效果需要的伤势数量，可能会根据您的游戏难度不同而发生变化。

languages.original_text: After falling into a trap or receiving damage that exceeds 50% of their total {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} within one round, a character will receive a fresh injury (the exact percentage of wounds a character must lose for this to happen may vary depending on the difficulty of the game you choose). Injuries reduce a character's {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g}. If the fresh injury is not healed within three rounds using a {g|ib:Medikit}medikit{/g}, it will turn into an old injury. You can also get rid of the old injury with a medikit; however, healing will require an additional {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g} skill test. All injuries reduce a character's stats, and if three or more injuries accumulate, they turn into {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}traumas{/g} (the number of injuries that cause trauma may vary depending on the difficulty of the game you choose).

languages.text: Al caer en una trampa o recibir {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} superior al 50 % de sus {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} totales en un mismo {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}, los personajes reciben una lesión reciente (el porcentaje exacto de heridas para que esto ocurra depende de la dificultad del juego). Las lesiones reducen la {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}firmeza{/g} del personaje. Si la lesión reciente no se cura en tres asaltos con un {g|ib:Medikit}botiquín{/g}, se convertirá en una lesión duradera. También puedes recuperarte de una lesión duradera con un botiquín, aunque requiere además una {g|Encyclopedia:Test}prueba{/g} de habilidad de {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g}. Todas las lesiones reducen las estadísticas del personaje, y, si se acumulan tres o más lesiones, se convierten en una {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}aflicción{/g} (el número de lesiones necesarias para adquirir una aflicción depende de la dificultad del juego).
languages.original_text: After falling into a trap or receiving {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} that exceeds 50% of their total {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} within one {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, a character will receive a fresh injury (the exact percentage of wounds a character must lose for this to happen may vary depending on the difficulty of the game you choose). Injuries reduce a character's {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g}. If the fresh injury is not healed within three rounds using a {g|ib:Medikit}medikit{/g}, it will turn into an old injury. You can also get rid of the old injury with a medikit; however, healing will require an additional {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g} skill {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}. All injuries reduce a character's stats, and if three or more injuries accumulate, they turn into {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}traumas{/g} (the number of injuries that cause trauma may vary depending on the difficulty of the game you choose).

traits.locale_text: Al caer en una trampa o recibir daño superior al 50 % de sus {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} totales en una misma {g|Encyclopedia:Round}ronda{/g}, los personajes reciben una {g|Encyclopedia:Injury}lesión reciente{/g} (el porcentaje exacto de heridas para que esto ocurra depende de la dificultad del juego). Las lesiones reducen la {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}firmeza{/g} del personaje. Si la lesión reciente no se cura en tres rondas con un {g|ib:Medikit}botiquín{/g}, se {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}convertirá{/g} en una lesión duradera. También puedes recuperarte de una lesión duradera con un botiquín, aunque requiere además una {g|Encyclopedia:Test}prueba{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}habilidad{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g}. Todas las lesiones reducen las estadísticas del personaje, y, si se acumulan tres o más lesiones, se convierten en una {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}aflicción{/g} (el número de lesiones necesarias para adquirir una aflicción depende de la dificultad del juego).

languages.text: 1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間に、罠にかかったり合計{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}負傷耐性{/g}の50％を超える{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を受けると、キャラクターは新たな負傷を負う（この新たな負傷が発生してキャラクターが失う負傷耐性の正確なパーセンテージはプレイヤーが選択した難易度により異なる）。負傷するとキャラクターの{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}決断力{/g}が弱まる。新たな負傷が3ラウンドの間に{g|ib:Medikit}メディキット{/g}を使用して回復しなければ、それは古い負傷に{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}変化{/g}する。古い負傷はメディキットで取り除くことができるが、追加の{g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}メディケア{/g}スキル{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}が必要となる。 すべての負傷はキャラクターのステータスを低下させ、負傷の累計が3以上になると、負傷は{g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}外傷{/g}に変化する（外傷を引き起こす負傷の数はプレイヤーが選択した難易度により異なる）。
languages.original_text: After falling into a trap or receiving {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} that exceeds 50% of their total {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} within one {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, a character will receive a fresh injury (the exact percentage of wounds a character must lose for this to happen may vary depending on the difficulty of the game you choose). Injuries reduce a character's {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g}. If the fresh injury is not healed within three rounds using a {g|ib:Medikit}medikit{/g}, it will {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g} into an old injury. You can also get rid of the old injury with a medikit; however, healing will require an additional {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g} skill {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g}. All injuries reduce a character's stats, and if three or more injuries accumulate, they turn into {g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}traumas{/g} (the number of injuries that cause trauma may vary depending on the difficulty of the game you choose).

traits.locale_text: 1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間に、罠にかかったり合計{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}負傷耐性{/g}の50％を超えるダメージを受けると、キャラクターは{g|Encyclopedia:Injury}新たな負傷{/g}を負う（この新たな負傷が発生してキャラクターが失う負傷耐性の正確なパーセンテージはプレイヤーが選択した難易度により異なる）。負傷するとキャラクターの{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}決断力{/g}が弱まる。新たな負傷が3ラウンドの間に{g|ib:Medikit}メディキット{/g}を使用して回復しなければ、それは古い負傷に{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}変化{/g}する。古い負傷はメディキットで取り除くことができるが、追加の{g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}メディケア{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Skills}スキル{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}が必要となる。 すべての負傷はキャラクターのステータスを低下させ、負傷の累計が3以上になると、負傷は{g|Encyclopedia:Traumas}トラウマ{/g}に変化する（トラウマを引き起こす負傷の数はプレイヤーが選択した難易度により異なる）。
